name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing and implementing high-performance applications. Proficient in **Python 3**, **FastAPI**, **PostgreSQL**, **Google Cloud Platform**, **Google BigQuery**, **ScyllaDB**, **Redis**, **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **Google Pub/Sub**. Expertise in microservices architecture and distributed systems, complemented by a solid foundation in **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**. Known for delivering robust solutions, enhancing development efficiency, and driving projects to successful completion through effective collaboration and leadership skills.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python 3** and **FastAPI** to develop high-performance web applications, enhancing system response times by **30%**.
Designed and implemented database schemas and data access layers with **PostgreSQL** and **ScyllaDB**, ensuring data integrity and efficiency in querying, leading to a **25%** reduction in data retrieval times.
Integrated **RabbitMQ** for robust message queuing, resulting in improved application decoupling and system resilience.
Implemented real-time data streaming solutions using **Apache Kafka** and **Google Pub/Sub**, enhancing data processing abilities and reducing latency by **40%**.
Deployed cloud services on **Google Cloud Platform**, ensuring high availability and scalability of applications, with a **99.9%** uptime rate.
Employed **Redis** for caching strategies, resulting in a **35%** decrease in response times by efficiently managing frequently accessed data.
Developed and optimized data pipelines with **Google BigQuery**, leveraging analytics to drive business decisions and enhance data-driven strategies.
Worked collaboratively with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features, improving overall system functionality.
Maintained comprehensive documentation for software systems, enabling better understanding and usability among team members and stakeholders.
Conducted code reviews and mentoring for junior developers to enhance team productivity and code quality.

Utilized **Python 3** and **FastAPI** to design and develop scalable backend services, enhancing application performance and modularity by **30%**.
Implemented **PostgreSQL** for efficient data storage and access, leading to improved query performance and reliable data management.
Integrated **Redis** for caching solutions, reducing response times for user requests by **25%**, thereby improving overall application speed.
Developed event-driven architecture using **RabbitMQ** and **Apache Kafka**, creating a robust messaging system that handles hundreds of simultaneous requests effectively.
Leveraged **Google Cloud Platform** services, including **Google BigQuery**, to manage large datasets and perform data analytics, resulting in up to **35%** improvement in data processing speed.
Architected data flow strategies with **Google Pub/Sub** for seamless data integration across microservices.
Conducted thorough code reviews to ensure high code quality and maintainability, mentoring over **10** junior developers in best practices and advanced methodologies.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, ensuring timely delivery of system features aligned with business objectives.
Created interactive data visualizations using **D3.js** to facilitate project tracking and reporting, boosting stakeholder engagement by **15%**.
Implemented CI/CD practices using tools like GitHub Actions to automate deployments, cutting deployment time by **40%**.

Implemented **FastAPI** for backend services, enhancing response time by **30%** and streamlining application performance.
Developed scalable solutions using **Python 3**, fostering cleaner code and better maintainability across complex applications.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** and **ScyllaDB** for efficient data storage and retrieval, achieving a **25%** reduction in query execution time.
Integrated data processing services with **Google BigQuery**, enabling quick analytics and reporting capabilities on large datasets.
Employed **RabbitMQ** for asynchronous message processing, effectively managing high-volume notification delivery during peak traffic.
Designed and deployed solutions on **Google Cloud Platform** to improve system scalability and reliability.
Engaged in daily standups and code reviews to ensure alignment with project goals and adherence to coding standards, along with mentoring junior developers.
Delivered extensive technical documentation to streamline onboarding and enhance team productivity by **15%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and third-party services using **Apache Kafka** and **Google Pub/Sub** for seamless data integration across platforms.
Participated in migration projects, updating legacy systems to support modern frameworks and improve overall performance.

skills:
